meanings.definition: The practice of breeding and raising fish for commercial purposes.
meanings.sent1: Pisciculture is important for providing fish to sell.
meanings.sent2: Many people work in pisciculture to raise fish for markets.
meanings.sent3: The businessman decided to start a pisciculture business to sell more fish.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, pisciculture can be a lucrative venture.
meanings.sent5: The art of pisciculture involves careful breeding and raising of fish.

meanings.definition: The cultivation of fish in controlled environments for food production.
meanings.sent1: Pisciculture helps ensure a steady supply of fish for food.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use pisciculture to grow fish in safe conditions.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that his secret to delicious fish dishes was his pisciculture skills.
meanings.sent4: In the controlled waters, pisciculture thrives to meet food demands.
meanings.sent5: The science of pisciculture allows us to produce fish sustainably.
